steps.intention: Identify relationships in the food web diagram
steps.note: Use the diagram to determine which species are directly affected by algae removal.

steps.intention: Predict impact of algae removal on species

steps.code: option_label = map_impact_to_option(impact_predictions, [{'label': 'A', 'text': 'Crabs and limpets will decrease'}, {'label': 'B', 'text': 'Dolphins will increase'}, {'label': 'C', 'text': 'Sea gulls will become extinct'}, {'label': 'D', 'text': 'Star fish will increase'}])
